posts.post_title: Looking for T206 Newspaper Ads- WILL PAY TOP $
posts.post_content:
Posted By: DB
Looking for Old Mill and Hindu newspaper ads btw 1909 - 1910 depicting the T206 cards. I am creating a webpage to document the various different designs. I am looking to purchase any ads and am looking for scans of ads for the webpage. Please email kilaartist@aol.com. Thanks

DB
